name: Fairytale Castle

bedrooms.bedType: 1 king bed, 1 single bed, 1 sofa bed

description:
"The Palace at Osowa Sien" awaits your intimate group of up to 40 guests.

While here, you’ll have the entire castle all to yourself including Finnish Sauna, 70 sqm. Wellness Studio, 65 sqm. main-floor Kitchen, professional sound equipment, dance floor, fireplace salon, 5 Ha. historical park with exotic trees, ample shade, and large terrace too.

Note: This listing is for up to 16 guests which is the AirBnb default, but we can can accommodate a maximum of 40 guests. Additional fee applies.

moreDescription.desc:
"The Palace at Osowa Sien" awaits your intimate group of up to 40 guests.

While here, you’ll have the entire castle all to yourself including Finnish Sauna, 70 sqm. Wellness Studio, 65 sqm. main-floor Kitchen, professional sound equipment, dance floor, fireplace salon, 5 Ha. historical park with exotic trees, ample shade, and large terrace too.

Note: This listing is for up to 16 guests which is the AirBnb default, but we can can accommodate a maximum of 40 guests. Additional fee applies.

This is our private residence so we've tried to think of and include all essentials for you to ensure a very comfortable stay including but not limited to:

Electric, eco-pellet Heating, firewood for the fireplaces or bonfires, premium all-natural spa towels from Aegean cotton, designer soft-cotton linens from textile designers "Essenza", hairdryers, mini-fridges, kettles, glassware, plateware, cutlery, and full-sized toiletries (organic), in every suite.

The WiFi is 35 - 70 mb/s and the entire palace has connection, including the cellar and terrace. There is ample parking too :)

Then there is the sauna, which is effortless to control, and you can turn it on or off whenever you like.

There are no additional fees for any of this, it's all what we consider basic necessities.

There are 12 suites and these range in size from 30-55 square meters. Due to the spacious layout these easily accommodate 2 -4 guests each. Several suites are 2-storeys, and every suite has an en-suite bathroom with both a rain-water shower and individual tub for soaking and relaxing in.

The 3 bedrooms on the other hand have been beautifully prepared under restored red-vaulted brick ceilings. Each room has a view to the gardens, and leverages the custom shower of the sauna and external WC just steps from the room itself.

All bookings made via this listing are guaranteed exclusive use of the castle and grounds throughout the entire duration of stay, no matter the group size. The default for the listing (price) reflects up to 16 guests. That said, this beautiful fairy tale heritage home can comfortably accommodate 35-40 guests every night, depending on sleeping arrangements (double vs single beds, children, etc).

Additional charges apply for more than 16 guests. Please connect directly to confirm your exact numbers.

As this is a substantial property, we are available via SMS / Wh*tsApp throughout your stay to facilitate questions and provisioning. The castle is also has central heating throughout.

Additional Facilities:
Grand kitchen with view of the gardens
Lounge with fireplace
Dining room with seating for up to 40
Wellness Studio with mats and bolsters for 10 practitioners
Dance Floor & Bar area with Wine Fridge
Finnish Sauna
Massage room and lounge
Main Castle tower with 4 mini parlours & 360 degree views from the top lounge
The castle is yours and you will have full access to it all.

offersSet.about: 30" TV with premium cable, standard cable

catOffers.more: Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper

catOffers.more: Allow stay for 28 days or more

name: Galbino Castle
description:
Galbino is a stunning 16th century castle in the midst of nature just a few kilometres from the enchanting village of Anghiari.
On a hill surrounded by woods and fields, Galbino Castle is a private and exclusive place to relax, explore nature, visit the cultural attractions of the area and enjoy the Tuscan delights of food and wine. The castle is naturally cool thanks to its thick walls and features an infinity pool with spectacular countryside views.

moreDescription.desc:
Galbino is a stunning 16th century castle in the midst of nature just a few kilometres from the enchanting village of Anghiari.
On a hill surrounded by woods and fields, Galbino Castle is a private and exclusive place to relax, explore nature, visit the cultural attractions of the area and enjoy the Tuscan delights of food and wine. The castle is naturally cool thanks to its thick walls and features an infinity pool with spectacular countryside views.

The Castle, which is rented out for private use, has ten bedrooms on two floors, a huge games room with billiards and a ping pong table, a large kitchen with a fireplace, two dining rooms, a library, a living room with walls covered in frescos and a small chapel which is still consecrated.

The castle is surrounded by a large garden, also for the exclusive use of guests, housing the spectacular infinity pool overlooking the Tuscan countryside.

A few steps from the pool there is a comfortable changing room with a bathroom and shower. A space in the garden adjacent to the castle is fitted out for outdoor dining and cooking, complete with a barbecue available to guests.

The villa is suitable to accommodate up to twenty one people with beds that can be adapted to single or double depending on the guests' needs.

Passed down through the generations, we have lovingly taken care of the villa, making it more and more comfortable and preserving its ancient charm.

We hope to welcome you for a holiday, but if you need a place suitable for smart working, we have an excellent and reliable Internet connection.

Guest access
The Castle is for personal use, easily reachable by car and with ample space to park. The nearest airports are those of Florence and Rome, and the nearest railway station is that of Arezzo.

Included in the price is a daily four-hour cleaning service (every morning except Sunday).
Bath and pool towels are provided for our guests.
On request, we can serve dinner with a tasting menu of Tuscan specialties to be arranged with our cook.
A few kilometres from the Galbino Castle there are two tennis courts (this is an external service).

catOffers.more: Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Allow stay for 28 days or more
